Rectangle to clip to. All points outside aren't drawn.

member.name: F:Mapsui.Rendering.Skia.Functions.ClippingFunctions.Intersecter
member.summary: Calculates the intersection point of line between pointStart and pointEnd and the edge. There are 4 edges (left, top, right, bottom).

member.summary: A Liang-Barsky implementation to detect the intersection between a line and a rect. With this, all lines, that aren't visible on screen could be sorted out. Found at https://gist.github.com/ChickenProp/3194723

member.name: F:Mapsui.Rendering.Skia.Functions.ClippingFunctions.Comparer
